typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExcelCSV
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
Pivot2 pivot(columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
ExcelCSV pivot(columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot2
